backFields.label: Term Details
backFields.value:
60 month term • 20% growth by maturity
$250 deposited to date

backFields.label: Engagement Phase
backFields.value:
◉◉◉○○ Phase 1 of 5: Engagement

Phases: Engagement → Residency → Anchorship

Your certificate unlocks access to Impact Briefings and priority allocation windows as you advance through holder phases.

backFields.label: Selected Priorities
backFields.value:
Your contribution supports projects focused on:

• Community Living
• Resilient Infrastructure  
• Food & Farming

These priorities guide Capitol Fund's investment strategy and impact measurement.

backFields.label: Issuer Hierarchy
backFields.value:
Offered thru: LocalFund — Capitol Fund (Series 2025Q4)

Registered in: Exchange Reserve PBLLC

Governed by: Legacy Impact Futures Trust (LIFT)

Exchange Reserve acts as custodial issuer, signer, and meta-ledger for all REV Certificates. LIFT provides governance framework analogous to a REIT for regenerative capital.

backFields.label: Certificate Verification
backFields.value:
Verify authenticity and view full certificate details:

https://exchangereserve.netlify.app/verify/LIFT-8472-9103

This pass receives automatic updates via Exchange Reserve's meta-ledger system for balance changes, milestone notifications, and new offering windows.

backFields.label: Trust Disclosures
backFields.value:
This certificate represents participation in a regenerative capital framework. It is not a traditional security or investment product. Maturity values are projections based on Capitol Fund performance and impact metrics.

Holders may qualify for priority access to future offerings based on engagement phase and contribution history. Geographic restrictions may apply.

For complete terms, visit: https://exchangereserve.netlify.app/terms/lift-2025q4

backFields.label: Contact & Support
backFields.value:
Exchange Reserve
hello@exchangereserve.org

Questions about your certificate, holder benefits, or upcoming briefings? Contact us anytime.

Dashboard: https://afluant.com
